title: Arm & Hammer Arm Hammer Ultra Last Unscented Clumping Cat Litter, MultiCat 18lb, Pet Friendly with Baking Soda
description: ARM & HAMMER Ultra Last Unscented Clumping Cat Litter is a smart choice that’s powered by pure ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda plus odor neutralizers. This clumping cat litter delivers a clean and refreshing unscented experience along with ultra long-lasting odor control.
